# The `MachineInstrBundleIterator` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> iterator that automatically skips over MIs that are inside bundles (i.e. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> iterator that automatically skips over MIs that are inside bundles (i.e.

walk top level MIs only).

Definition at line 108 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundleiterator-h">MachineInstrBundleIterator.h</a>.

### MachineInstrBundleIterator() {#aac0870167caa44d584c9ff6710deb7c0}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename Ty, bool IsReverse = false&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>llvm::MachineInstrBundleIterator&lt; Ty, IsReverse &gt;::MachineInstrBundleIterator (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbundleiterator">MachineInstrBundleIterator</a>&lt; Ty, !IsReverse &gt; &amp; I)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "explicit"]}>
Explicit conversion between forward/reverse iterators.

Translate between forward and reverse iterators without changing range boundaries. The resulting iterator will dereference (and have a handle) to the previous node, which is somewhat unexpected; but converting the two endpoints in a range will give the same range in reverse.

This matches std::reverse&#95;iterator conversions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundleiterator-h/#l00169">169</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundleiterator-h">MachineInstrBundleIterator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### getReverse() {#a13dd64c40d9f175e578ade3ef60ea351}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename Ty, bool IsReverse = false&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>reverse&#95;iterator llvm::MachineInstrBundleIterator&lt; Ty, IsReverse &gt;::getReverse () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get a reverse iterator to the same node.

Gives a reverse iterator that will dereference (and have a handle) to the same node. Converting the endpoint iterators in a range will give a different range; for range operations, use the explicit conversions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundleiterator-h/#l00283">283</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundleiterator-h">MachineInstrBundleIterator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
